item.name: Pacifying
entries: This rune turns weapons into instruments of peacemaking.

entries.trigger: You damage a creature with a pacifying weapon
entries: The damaged creature must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or be pacified. A pacified creature takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls on any attacks that aren't {@trait nonlethal} for 1 minute, and the creature also experiences a clear psychic warning that they should stop dealing lethal damage.
